contents:
不好意思，在英语表达的层级里，braces[]: Fitting everything into a sentence can be tricky, but this is where brackets are useful. Brackets (parentheses) are punctuation marks used within a sentence to include information that is not essential to the main point.
用square brackets表示强调，无论在中文还是在英文里都不合适，只能说是标新立异过头了。
另外这篇文章读了一下，很大部分似乎是来自于2011年左右豆瓣的一篇热文。
